    <h1 class="Page-headline">Man shot to death in West Englewood</h1>



                        
    <h2 class="Page-subHeadline">The man, 26, was in a car going east near the 1300 block of West 59th Street about 4:05 p.m. when three suspects exited a dark-colored SUV and opened fire, striking him in the head and arm.</h2>

                                <div class="RichTextArticleBody RichTextBody">
                                    
                                        
                                    
                                    <p>A man was shot to death Thursday afternoon in West Englewood on the South Side.</p><div class="RTEHashTagLabAdModule"><div class="HTLAds amp_med_rec" data-unit="/suntimes/chicago.suntimes.com/metro-state/crime" data-targeting="{"position":"amp_med_rec"}"></div>
</div><div class="RTEHashTagLabAdModule"><div class="HTLAds htlad-mobile_article_body" data-unit="/suntimes/chicago.suntimes.com/metro-state/crime" data-targeting="{}"></div>
</div><p>The man, 26, was in a car going east near the 1300 block of West 59th Street about 4:05 p.m. when three suspects exited a dark-colored SUV and opened fire, striking him in the head and arm, Chicago police said.</p><p>He was taken to the University of Chicago Medical Center, where he was pronounced dead, police said. He hasn’t been identified yet.</p><p>No one was in custody.<br></p>
                                </div>

    <div class="PagePromo-title">
        <a class="Link"  href="https://chicago.suntimes.com/2022/9/15/23355194/indiana-refinery-to-pay-2-75-million-in-air-pollution-case" data-cms-ai="0"   >Indiana refinery to pay $2.75 million in air pollution case</a>
    </div>



        
    <div class="PagePromo-description">BP, the giant oil company, agreed to settle a lawsuit brought by environmental groups that accused the Whiting, Indiana, refinery of repeatedly violating the U.S. Clean Air Act. </div>



        
    <div class="PagePromo-byline">
        <div class="PagePromo-author">

        <script type="text/javascript">
    tp = window["tp"] || [];
    
    tp.push(["setUsePianoIdUserProvider", true]);
    tp.push(["setDebug", false]);
    (function (src) {
        var a = document.createElement("script");
        a.type = "text/javascript";
        a.async = true;
        a.src = src;
        var b = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
        b.parentNode.insertBefore(a, b)
    })('//experience.tinypass.com/xbuilder/experience/load?aid=FV0czWAOfe');

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function (evt) {
        // Login click
        document.querySelector('.Page-header-piano-login-controls-sign-in').addEventListener('click',
            function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                if (tp.pianoId) {
                    if (tp.pianoId.isUserValid()) {
                        return;
                    }
                }
                showPianoLogin();
            })

        // Logout click
        document.querySelector('.Page-header-piano-login-controls-logout').addEventListener('click',
            function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                pianoLogout();
            })
    })

    // on successful login https://docs.piano.io/callbacks/#loginsuccessevent
    tp.push(["addHandler", "loginSuccess", function(data){
       toggleFields(true);
       tp.amp.login();
    }]);

    // on load
    tp.push(["init", function () { // if we're signed in
        tp.experience.init();
        if (tp.user.isUserValid()) {
            toggleFields(true);
        } else {
            toggleFields(false);
        }

        tp.myaccount.show({
            displayMode: "inline",
            containerSelector: "#my-account"
        });
    }])

    function showPianoLogin() {
        tp = window.tp || [];
        tp.push(["init", function () {
            tp.pianoId.show({
                screen: 'login',
                loggedIn: function (data) {
                    console.log('user ', data.user, ' logged in with token', data.token);
                    document.cookie = '__pianouid=' + data.user.uid + '; path=/;'
                    document.querySelectorAll('.loggedin').forEach(function (el) {
                        el.style.display = 'block'
                    })

                    document.querySelectorAll('.loggedout').forEach(function (el) {
                        el.style.display = 'none'
                    })
                }
            });
        }]);
    }

    function pianoLogout() {
        tp = window.tp || [];
        tp.pianoId.logout(function () {
            document.cookie = "onaip_=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;"
            document.cookie = "__pianouid=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;"
            document.querySelectorAll('.loggedin').forEach(function (el) {
                el.style.display = 'none'
            })

            document.querySelectorAll('.loggedout').forEach(function (el) {
                el.style.display = 'block'
            })
        });
    }

    function toggleFields(loggedIn) {
        if (loggedIn) {
            document.querySelectorAll('.loggedin').forEach(function (el) {
                el.style.display = 'block'
            })

            document.querySelectorAll('.loggedout').forEach(function (el) {
                el.style.display = 'none'
            })

            document.querySelector('.Page-header-subscribe-btn').style.display = 'none';

        } else {
            document.querySelectorAll('.loggedin').forEach(function (el) {
                el.style.display = 'none'
            })

            document.querySelectorAll('.loggedout').forEach(function (el) {
                el.style.display = 'block'
            })
        }
    }

    //-- Custom Tracking / Segmentation --//
    // Tags
    var js_tags = []
    var template = "article";

    if (template == "article" || template == "stream") {
        
            js_tags.push("crime")
        

        
            js_tags.push("news")
        
            js_tags.push("metro-state")
        
    }

    // Primary Section Name
    var categoryName;
     
        categoryName = "crime"
     

    // isArchive - 1 if the publish date was over a year ago
    var cstArchive = 0;
    

    if (categoryName == undefined) {
        if (window.location.pathname === '/') {
            categoryName = "Front Page"
        }
        else {
            var pathname = window.location.pathname.split('/')
            categoryName = pathname.slice(-1)[0]
        }
    }

    if (template == "article") {
      js_tags.push("cst_article")
    }

    tp.push(["setContentCreated", "2022-09-15T23:04:05.569Z"]);
    tp.push(["setContentAuthor", "Sun-Times Wire"]);
    tp.push(["setTags", js_tags]);
    tp.push(["setContentSection", categoryName]);
    tp.push(["setZone", "Web"]);
    tp.push(["setContentIsNative", false]);

</script>
